message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm asking for $18,000 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I understand its value, but I'm only able to pay up to $15,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is really my bottom line. I know this product will be a huge asset to you.  What would you say to meeting halfway at $16,500?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still only able to pay up to $15,000 for the product. I hope we can find a way to meet in the middle.
